title: bots in aram q
body: im level 15 my brothers 30 so far to games its been total 3 players my side 1 on other team rest are bots. but they have names and same among wins for every bot player

replies.body:
Thanks for reporting about these accounts! 

I know it's frustrating to run into bots in queue - and because of this we're actively tracking, identifying and permanently banning bot accounts daily in Oceania. 

Unfortunately, these accounts typically have to play a few games before we can be sure if they are indeed bots - so there may be some impact regardless of this process.
all bots i run into today had less 180 wins so my question is how are they getting past you guys
